= *User Page* =

 
= Software Requirements =

    * Apache
    * MySQL
    * PHP 5.3


=Installation=

  * Install XAMPP
  * Access your phpMyAdmin web interface from XAMPP
  * Place all the documents into the XAMPP "htdocs" folder (e.g. c:/xampp/htdocs/)
  * Create a database called ims
  * Select this database then click Import
  * Browse to /ims.sql/ and click Go
  * The database is now set up
  * Edit the file config.php - This file contains your database login information and location.Edit these two lines to contain your database login and password
    $user  = "root";
    $password ="";
